com.viaoa.object

Class OALock

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.object.OALock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class OALock
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    OALock is used for setting and sharing locks on Objects.

    Note: setting a lock does not restrict access to an Object, it only serves as a flag. It is currently the applications responsiblity to enforce rules based on a lock being set.

    Note: this also works with OASync (Clients/Server) to create distributed locks.

    For more information about this package, see documentation.

    See Also:

      • OALock

        protected OALock(java.lang.Object object,
      java.lang.Object refObject,
      java.lang.Object miscObject)
        Used for creating a lock on an object.
        Parameters:
        object - to lock
        refObject - reference object used with a WeakReference. If it is garbage collected, then the lock is removed.
        miscObject - object to store with locked object
